reviewText: The feud between the Sandman and Raven is one of the best  rivalries in extreme championship wrestling history  and you can read live how it all went down in this six disc collection from the brutal bloody wars in the ring to the epic promos outside the ring you will get the entire thing it's a great price great quality and well worth relieving
The promos alone were worth the price of this DVD set.

Great, yet not so great. Great because it is Raven, was so excited for this. As was already expected, the quality was as if you taped it on VHS yourself. i was fine with that. What bothered me was this was originally a VHS Collection put on DVD. Yet they just dumped it with no chapter navigation. SO basically you need to devote the time to watch a whole disc, otherwise good luck getting to where you left off. When it was a VHS tape set, you could take it out, and go back to it later since that is how VHS was. Now on DVD with no navigation, makes a pain in the arse. I watched disc one, again was excited, but towards the end was watching the clock because I had other things to do, and had to watch in one sitting. Haven't gotten back to watch the other DVDs, as I don't often get the time it would take to watch a whole disc. Would love to continue watching and relive this classic feud, but  the way this set is, I probably won't get to it.

This has everything -and I mean EVERYTHING - from the Sandman - Raven fued. All televised matches, promos, and even fancam matches are included. Everything, unlike the WWE DVD's that feature ECW content, is unedited, so you get the wrestlers' entrance themes, like Metallica's "Enter Sandman" for The Sandman and etc. The video quality is pretty good, if you're curious about that. If you were a fan of ECW, you will definetly want this set. Highly reccomended.
Raven Vs Sandman is a great box set.  If you are a fan of ECW, you must buy this box set. The fights are the best you will ever see. Thank you for the fast service. Your company is the best.
